<uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="uaba:ActivityDTO" Capacity="4"> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[colMapping]]" FieldValue="{}{{
 var rawMap = eval('[[Dev2GridMappingJson]]');
 var emitMap = "[";
 for(var i = 0; i < rawMap.cols.length; i++){
 emitMap += '{"sTitle": "'+ rawMap.cols[i].Dev2ColumnHeader + '",';
 emitMap += '"sClass" : "'+rawMap.cols[i].Dev2ColumnAlignment.toLowerCase() + '",';
 var w = rawMap.cols[i].Dev2GridWidth;
 if(w.indexOf("px") < 0){
 if(w.length <= 0){
 w = "50px";
 }else{
 w += "px";
 }
 }
 emitMap += '"sWidth": "' + w + '"}';
 if((i+1) < rawMap.cols.length){
 emitMap += ", ";
 }
 }
 emitMap += "]";
}}" IndexNumber="1" WatermarkTextValue="Value" WatermarkTextVariable="[[Variable1]]"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2" WatermarkTextValue="Value" WatermarkTextVariable="[[Variable2]]"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> </scg:List> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> <FlowStep.Next> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID13"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">529,836</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">256,104</av:Size> <av:PointCollection x:Key="ConnectorLocation">529,888 470,888 470,959</av:PointCollection> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity CurrentResult="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputMapping="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" OnResumeKeepList="{x:Null}" OutputMapping="{x:Null}" ParentServiceName="{x:Null}" ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign (1)" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="256,104" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False"> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="uaba:ActivityDTO" Capacity="4"> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[Dev2GridWidth]]" FieldValue="{}{{

UpdateAllOccurrences="False"> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="uaba:ActivityDTO" Capacity="4"> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[Fragment]]" FieldValue="<div id="container" [[customStyle]]>
 <div c="gridHeader"> [[Dev2elementNameDataGrid]] </div>
 <table id="example" class="display">
 [[Dev2BindingData]]
 </table>
</div>
<script>

 $(document).ready(function() {
 /* Add a click handler to the rows - this could be used as a callback */
 $("#example tbody").click(function(event) {
 $(oTable.fnSettings().aoData).each(function (){
 $(this.nTr).removeClass('row_selected');
 });
 $(event.target.parentNode).addClass('row_selected');
 });

 var colMap = eval('[[colMapping]]');

 /* Init the table */
 /* "bPaginate": false, */
 var oTable = $('#example').dataTable({ 
 "bJQueryUI": true,
 "sPaginationType": "full_numbers",
 "aoColumns": colMap,
 "sScrollY": "100%",
 "sScrollX": "100%",
 "sScrollXInner": "100%",
 "sDom": '<"toolbar">frtip',
 "iDisplayLength" : [[Dev2RowsPerGrid]]
 });
 
 /* set toolbar */
 $("div.toolbar").html([[editBtns]]);
 
 [[deleteHandler]]
 
 [[editHandler]]
 
 [[addHandler]]
 
 } );
 
 
 /* Get the rows which are currently selected */
 function fnGetSelected( oTableLocal )
 {
 var aReturn = new Array();
 var aTrs = oTableLocal.fnGetNodes();
 
 for ( var i=0 ; i<aTrs.length ; i++ )
 {
 if ( $(aTrs[i]).hasClass('row_selected') )
 {
 aReturn.push( aTrs[i] );
 }
 }
 return aReturn;
 }

</script>" IndexNumber="1" WatermarkTextValue="Value" WatermarkTextVariable="[[Variable1]]"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> FieldValue="emitGridToolBar(true)" IndexNumber="1" WatermarkTextValue="Value" WatermarkTextVariable="[[Variable1]]"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[editHandler]]" FieldValue="/* init the edit operation */
$("#editRow").click( function(){
 try{
 var sRow = fnGetSelected(oTable);
 var sData = sRow[0].innerHTML;
 var aPos = oTable.fnGetPosition( sRow[0] );
 toggleGridEdit("container", "[[Dev2elementNameDataGrid]]", "[[Dev2elementGridEditingService]]","Edit","[[Dev2WebServer]]", sData,'[[Dev2GridMappingJson]]', aPos); 
 }catch(e){}
});" IndexNumber="2" WatermarkTextValue="Value" WatermarkTextVariable="[[Variable2]]"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[addHandler]]" FieldValue="/* init the add operation */
$("#addRow").click(function(){
 toggleGridEdit("container", "[[Dev2elementNameDataGrid]]", "[[Dev2elementGridEditingService]]","Add", "[[Dev2WebServer]]","",'[[Dev2GridMappingJson]]');
});" IndexNumber="3" WatermarkTextValue="" WatermarkTextVariable=""> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[deleteHandler]]" FieldValue="/* init the delete operation */
$("#deleteRow").click( function(){
 
 try{
 var sRow = fnGetSelected(oTable);
 var sData = sRow[0].innerHTML;
 var dataSend = htmlToXML("delete", sData);
 
 $.ajax({url: "[[Dev2WebServer]]/services/[[Dev2elementGridEditingService]]?operation=Delete",
 async: false,
 data : dataSend,
 type: "POST",
 dataType: "xml",
 success: function(xhr, textStatus){
 oTable.fnDeleteRow(sRow[0]);
 },
 error : function(xhr, textStatus){
 $("#errorRegion").html("Error Deleting ");
 }
 }); 
 }catch(e){}
});" IndexNumber="4" WatermarkTextValue="" WatermarkTextVariable=""> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO>
